sentence_zh_TW: 這個城市的中心有一個大型的公園，是居民們聚集的地方。
sentence: There is a large park in the ______ part of the city where residents gather.

sentence_zh_TW: 這位作家的最新小說贏得了年度最佳獎賞，受到了廣泛的讚譽。
sentence: The author's latest novel received the ______ for Best Book of the Year and was widely acclaimed.

sentence_zh_TW: 這本書包含了許多重要的案例研究，對學習非常有幫助。
sentence: This book ______ many important case studies that are very helpful for learning.

sentence_zh_TW: 在這場危機中，女消防員展現出了非凡的勇氣和專業技術。
sentence: During the crisis, the ______ displayed extraordinary bravery and professional skill.

sentence_zh_TW: 早餐時，我喜歡吃一碗健康的穀物，這樣可以開始新的一天。
sentence: For breakfast, I enjoy a bowl of healthy ______ to kickstart the new day.

sentence_zh_TW: 在這部電影中，邪惡的角色策劃著一個陰險的計劃，試圖摧毀主角的生活。
sentence: In this movie, the ______ character plots a sinister plan to ruin the protagonist's life.

sentence_zh_TW: 與友人共度愉快的時光讓我感到非常放鬆和開心。
sentence: Spending time with friends is a very ______ experience that makes me feel relaxed and happy.

sentence_zh_TW: 他的表現有些不如預期，所以我們需要改進策略來克服困難。
sentence: His performance was ______ below expectations, so we need to improve our strategy to overcome challenges.

sentence_zh_TW: 在這種情況下，我們需要找到更有效的方式來處理這個問題。
sentence: In this situation, we need to find a more effective way to ______ this issue.

sentence_zh_TW: 我想要一個更加舒適的椅子，讓我能在工作時享受較好的姿勢。
sentence: I ______ a more comfortable chair so that I can enjoy better posture while working.

sentence_zh_TW: 入學時，學生需要支付一筆學費，這筆費用用於服務和設施。
sentence: When enrolling, students need to pay a tuition ______, which goes towards services and facilities.

sentence_zh_TW: 歷史上，鐵路的建設促進了經濟發展，改變了人們的旅行方式和商品運輸。
sentence: Historically, the construction of ______ significantly boosted economic development and changed the way people traveled and goods were transported.

sentence_zh_TW: 人體的結構包括許多骨頭，其中每一根都在支撐和保護內部器官方面扮演著重要角色。
sentence: The structure of the human body includes many ______, each playing an important role in supporting and protecting internal organs.

sentence_zh_TW: 早期檢測癌症可以顯著提高治療的成功率，增加患者的生存機會。
sentence: Early detection of ______ can significantly improve treatment success rates and increase survival chances for patients.

sentence_zh_TW: 在寒冷的冬天，穿上厚厚的衣服可以讓你感到溫暖，避免受到寒冷的侵襲。
sentence: In the cold of winter, wearing thick clothing can keep you ______ and protect you from the biting chill.

sentence_zh_TW: 每個幾個星期去一次美容院做理髮，讓我的外貌保持整潔和時尚。
sentence: Going to the salon every few weeks for a ______ helps me maintain a neat and stylish appearance.

sentence_zh_TW: 國內的航空公司提供了多個目的地的航班，使旅行變得更加便利。
sentence: The ______ airlines provide flights to numerous destinations, making travel much more convenient.

sentence_zh_TW: 在購物時，通常需要根據需要購買適當的數量，避免浪費和短缺。
sentence: When shopping, it is usually important to purchase the right ______ based on your needs to avoid waste and shortages.

sentence_zh_TW: 一般來說，在進行大型項目之前，先進行詳細的計劃是非常重要的，以確保一切順利進行。
sentence: As a ______ rule, it is vital to carry out detailed planning before embarking on a big project to ensure everything runs smoothly.

sentence_zh_TW: 在每年的新年前夕，無論是大城市還是小鎮，慶祝活動都吸引著大量的人們聚集在一起。
sentence: On New Year's ______ every year, celebrations in both big cities and small towns attract large gatherings of people.
